ingredients: 4 cups soft bread cubes, 2 cups peeled and sliced apples,   +   1/4 cup raisins, 1   +   3/4 cups milk, 1 cup brown sugar,   +   1/4 cup margarine, 2 large eggs, beaten, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon,   +   1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract
nutrition: Total Fat 20g 26%, Saturated Fat 4g 22%, Cholesterol 52mg 17%, Sodium 372mg 16%, Total Carbohydrate 59g 21%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 47g, Protein 6g, Vitamin C 1mg 7%, Calcium 154mg 12%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 233mg 5%
